title: Change Text in a Block
description:
Using the output block in the tray build a program that displays your name, age, birthdate, and about me paragraph. Be sure to follow the example format below.

Name: Sasha
Age: 17
Birthdate: 01/18/2014
About Me: I'm a middle schooler who loves to learn and try new things. I enjoy reading, playing sports, and working on creative projects. Hanging out with my friends is always fun, and I'm always curious about new hobbies. Even though I'm still figuring things out, I'm excited for what the future holds!
hint: Start by editing the first two output blocks so your name and age are displayed. Then add two more output blocks. Edit the output blocks so they display your birthdate and about me. You may choose to use concatination or place all the text into one string of text.
